ISSUE.TITLE: What3Words.csproj contains illegal character which stops VSMac from loading project
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.6.0 [Extra char line 17](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/88132eaba6338096bbeed657e05ee98612f19eff/src/Plugins/Nop.Plugin.Widgets.What3words/Nop.Plugin.Widgets.What3words.csproj#L17) Steps to reproduce the problem: Open the file in vscode to see the issue ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19661735/209937520-2891dbf7-7f8e-46e3-971a-3900e398def9.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19661735/209937821-549a8dc5-11b5-4f7c-9435-d1e1199cda2f.png) ``` Error while trying to load the project '/Users/iainrough/ RiderProjects/NopCommerce/ src/Plugins/ Nop.Plugin.Widgets.What3words Nop.Plugin.Widgets.What3words csproj': Text content is not allowed inside a Project element / Users/iainrough/RiderProjects/ NopCommerce/src/Plugins/Nop.Plugin.Widgets.What3words Nop.Plugin.Widgets.What3words.csproj ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6500 What3Words.csproj contains illegal character which stops VSMac from loading project
